name: Cyber Rescue: Virus Eruption
description:
Cyber Rescue: Virus Eruption

In this fast-paced 80's inspired synthwave arcade racer you have to reach the deepest darkest parts of cyberspace in order to destroy the source of the devastating computer virus that has infected your A.I friend. To stay alive you must master your flight controls in order to dodge obstacles and collect anti-virus pickups to help you along the way, all to the amazing synthwave-tunes of Mitch Murder. 

Developed in 8 weeks at half-time by 15 students using an in-house engine that they created during the development process.

KEY FEATURES:
  • Fast-paced single-player racing
  • Fantastic synthwave music by Mitch Murder
  • Anime cinematics
  • Easy to play, hard to master
  • Keyboard and gamepad support
